label: Neutrino mixing from hidden rotation
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: Neutrino mixing from hidden rotation. Validation: Oscillation = geometric invariant
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
import math
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
sterile = reg.sterile_sector     # 163 - Hidden bulk
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288
chi = reg.chi_eff                # 144

# PMNS mixing angles from geometric rotation in V7
# Neutrino oscillation = rotation between visible and sterile sectors
theta_12 = math.asin(math.sqrt(sterile / roots)) * 180 / math.pi  # Solar angle
theta_23 = math.asin(math.sqrt(chi / roots)) * 180 / math.pi      # Atmospheric angle
verified = 30 < theta_12 < 40 and 40 < theta_23 < 50
